## Container.dependencies() method

Prepare a map with the dependencies for a descriptor.

This will always inject the container itself to configure children.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected dependencies<TOptions extends BaseOptions>(deps: Array<Dependency>, passed: PartialOptions<TOptions>): Promise<TOptions>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deps | <code>Array&lt;Dependency&gt;</code> |  |
|  passed | <code>PartialOptions&lt;TOptions&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<TOptions>`
